LanguageData.DMS_Military01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] failed as a bandit and was unfortunately captured by a colonial group. However, after realizing how attractive and better the lifestyle and goals of these people were while serving a labor sentence, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to stay after being released from prison.
LanguageData.DMS_Military01.title: Reformed Bandit
LanguageData.DMS_Military02.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a medic in the Armed Forces and retired from military life prematurely after a serious injury.
LanguageData.DMS_Military02.title: Retired Medic
LanguageData.DMS_Military03.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a security for guarding the captured bandits and raiders, supervising them until they were free to go after serving their sentences.
LanguageData.DMS_Military03.title: Prison Security
LanguageData.DMS_Military04.description: Out of seeing the vastness of this planet, [PAWN_nameDef] became a voluntary militia trooper in the colonial group, tranfered in duty to various colonial strongholds with the pace of stronghold development, and used the guns on hand to protect himself and [PAWN_pronoun] companions when necessary.
LanguageData.DMS_Military04.title: Voluntary Militia
LanguageData.DMS_Military05.description: Since the physical examination was passed by rounded off standards, [PAWN_nameDef], who had no special skills, followed through the enlistment order of the colonial fleet and after receiving simple training, became a substitute colonist and was sent to the ground to assist in the ongoing colonization work.
LanguageData.DMS_Military05.title: Reserved Colonist
LanguageData.DMS_Military06.description: Due to the chaotic distribution of the faction-controlled areas in the rimworld, [PAWN_nameDef] job is to accompany the special police to use limited violence in order to uproot the bandit sites that spread like weeds one by one.
LanguageData.DMS_Military06.title: Riot Commando
LanguageData.DMS_Military07.description: During [PAWN_pronoun] long life as a pilot, [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for transporting people and materials across a large sector, and also learned to solve annoying mechanical and human problems along the way.
LanguageData.DMS_Military07.title: Shuttle Pilot
LanguageData.DMS_Military08.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. To deal with possible existential threats during the pioneering period, [PAWN_pronoun] job is to use guns to drive away those things that are harmful to the colonists...if guns can still be used to solve them.
LanguageData.DMS_Military08.title: Armed Escort
